ID: This rule is assigned to %1 automated reminder rule(s). Deleting this rule will automatically unassign it.
Identification: This rule is assigned to %1 automated reminder rule(s). Deleting this rule will automatically unassign it.
Règles du rappel de courriel commercial automatisé

ID: Are you sure you want to match this rule now?
Identification: Êtes-vous sûr(e) de vouloir égaler cette règle maintenant?

ID: No more than %1 customers may receive the reminder email after this action.
Identification: No more than %1 customers may receive the reminder email after this action.

ID: You need to set at least one condition for this rule to work.
Identification: You need to set at least one condition for this rule to work.

ID: Reminder emails may promote a shopping cart price rule with or without a coupon. If a shopping cart price rule defines an auto-generated coupon, this reminder rule will generate a random coupon code for each customer.
Identification: Reminder emails may promote a shopping cart price rule with or without a coupon. If a shopping cart price rule defines an auto-generated coupon, this reminder rule will generate a random coupon code for each customer.

ID: Promotion rule this reminder will advertise.
Identification: Règle de promotion pour laquelle ce rappel fait de publicité.

ID: Enter the number of days before email reminder rule is triggered if conditions match (comma separate, e.g., "7, 14").
Identification: Enter the number of days before email reminder rule is triggered if conditions match (comma separate, e.g., "7, 14").

ID: Only customers who registered on a store view will receive emails related to that store view.
Identification: Only customers who registered on a store view will receive emails related to that store view.

ID: You can find and edit rule label and descriptions, per store view, in email templates.
Identification: You can find and edit rule label and descriptions, per store view, in email templates.

ID: Rule Title for All Store Views
Identification: Titre de la règle pour toutes les vues de boutique

ID: Rule Description for All Store Views

ID: Titles and Descriptions Per Store View
Identification: Titres et descriptions par vue de boutique

ID: Overrides default titles and descriptions. Note that if email an template is not specified for this store view, the respective variable values will be deleted.
Identification: Écrase les titres par défaut et les descriptions. Notez que si un courriel et modèle ne sont pas spécifiés pour cette vue de boutique, les valeurs de variables respectives seront effacés.

Identification: Please correct the reminder rule you requested.

Identification: We could not save the reminder rule.

Identification: We could not delete the reminder rule.
